level.heading: Redisclosure.
level.text: Redisclosure of any mental health information disclosed pursuant to this subchapter shall be governed by order of the court or, if no order is issued, by the rules of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-136, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1201.01.
